name: Space To Maneuver
description:
""Congratulations for finding this ship! Now you might be wondering, “Who are you?” and “What is going on?” Answers to those questions are:

  • It doesn’t matter
  • All kinds of stuff""

Space To Maneuver is a game for the Weekly Game jam (Week 122) with the theme of "One action." Our game fills this theme by having the movement of the ship rely on one key: Spacebar

The game's art and coding are by me, NanoB0T (Nino Saareks), but credit for the great sound design and music go to Dartikus. (Darío Blanco)

In addition to flying around and exploring areas, there are planets, moons and stations that you can explore in a text adventure format. This all makes up for a short, but hopefully sweet experience.

What might lie at the destination of your journey?
